name: Trenchrunner
description:
TRENCHRUNNER

Keep the bomb pressure stable as you carry it though the perilous trench.
Seek out and destroy the source of the deadly gas.

VENT
    - To stabilize pressure, will reduce speed
SHOOT
    - To damage enemies, will increase pressure
RUN
    - To avoid gas, will cause death

CONTROLS

MOVE - WASD or Arrow Keys or Left Joystick
VENT - X or L or Bottom Face Button
SHOOT - C or K or Left Face Button

MADE WITH LOVE BY

Sam Curley - Lead Developer, Audio, Game Design
Rachel Curley - Environment Art, Game Design
Ollie Moss - Character Art, Animation, Game Design

A game made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 49.
